title: Brazil in wait-and-see mode after Milei win, says finance minister
description:
Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad on Monday wished Argentina’s President-elect Javier Milei luck. Mr. Milei defeated Sergio Massa, Argentina’s economy minister, by a resounding margin of 56-44 percent, handing Peronism its biggest political defeat in some 40 years. The Brazilian government has been anything but neutral on Argentina’s recent elections. In 2019, then-President Jair Bolsonaro […]

The post Brazil in wait-and-see mode after Milei win, says finance minister appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Reality check for Brazil’s GDP forecasts
description:
Following a slew of indicators pointing to a slowdown in Brazil’s economy in Q3, market analysts are revising their GDP growth forecasts for the country.  The Central Bank’s Focus Report, a weekly market survey of leading financial institutions and investment firms, on Monday sharply lowered the median growth forecast for 2023 from 2.90 percent four […]

The post Reality check for Brazil’s GDP forecasts appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
